suite.name: Base

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: Getting file 'D:\Pessoal\SENAC\Estágio\Compass\Sprint 5 - Robot-Framework em APIs\CHALLENGE\json_usuario_ex.json'.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: PUT On Session
kw.doc: Sends a PUT request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: PUT Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios/1562586 path_url=/usuarios/1562586 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '104', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"nome": "Invalido Tester", "email": "zequinha@qa.com.br", "password": "teste", "administrador": "true"}'

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.arg: Este email já está sendo usado
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

suite.doc: Arquivo simples para requisições HTTP em APIs REST
